front.title: Evaluation of existing GMPLS encoding against G.709v3 Optical Transport Networks (OTN)

abstract.t: The recent revision of ITU-T recommendation G.709 [G.709-2012] has introduced new fixed and flexible Optical Data Unit (ODU) containers in Optical Transport Networks (OTNs), enabling optimized support for an increasingly abundant service mix. This document provides an evaluation of existing Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) routing and signaling methods against the G.709-2012 OTN networks.
